net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations

Annotation Type Timer


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Timer
    Methods marked with @Timer will called periodically from a timer. The method may return a boolean value. If this value is true, the timer will be canceled. For example, to specify that after the plugin's creation a specific method should be called from a timer, you would write:

    @Timer
    public void ping() { ... }

    All timers are terminated upon PluginManager.shutdown().
    Author:
    Ralf Biedert
    See Also:
    Thread

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      long period
      Period of the timer.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      long startupDelay
      When to start the timer.
      Timer.TimerType timerType
      Specifies the type of this timer.
